entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a student at Hogwarts and one of Ron's friends. He is described as looking uncomfortable when questioned about something he was doing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and Percy's friend. He is described as grinning when asking Percy to tell him what he was doing.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a student at Hogwarts and one of Ron's friends. She is mentioned as having seen Percy doing something and being asked by him not to mention it to anyone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and one of Ron's friends. He is described as never having seen Percy look so uncomfortable before.

relationships.description: Percy asked Ginny not to mention what she saw him doing to anyone.
Ron questioned Percy about what he was doing, and Percy looked uncomfortable.
